manifest.author: patrickozdag
manifest.changelog:
fixed mute activity bubbles
disabled "reels tap to pause smashable mute" because it was causing bubbles not showing in some scenarios
disabled "transparent status bar" to prevent the bug which creates a huge space above reels/friends row when you open a reel from a story

*please enable the "enable auto update" option in the backup library to access the latest features/fixes as soon as they're released.*
manifest.name: Burak's Instafel Backup
